participant_1.background:
I play the guitar and sing as a way to relax and express myself.
I'm not married, but I have been playing video games with my kids since they were little.
i am entering the police academy this summer.
i love to recycle.
and also love drawing.

participant_2.background:
I'm feeling nostalgic today, so I'm going to watch some old movies from my childhood.
I spend my days doing schoolwork and physical therapy while healing from my broken leg.
winter s my favorite time of the year.
I work as a barista, and I love creating delicious coffee drinks for my customers.
My cosplay costume is coming in the mail, so I'm going to start practicing my makeup this weekend.

content.text: Hey there, how are you doing?
Hello, I'm doing well. I'm feeling a little nostalgic today so I'm going to watch some old movies from my childhood. How about you?
I'm doing great, thanks! I'm getting ready to go to the police academy this summer so I've been spending a lot of time practicing my physical fitness.
Wow, that sounds exciting! I'm sure you'll do great. I'm currently spending my days doing schoolwork and physical therapy while I heal from my broken leg.
Oh, that sounds like a lot to deal with. I hope you have a speedy recovery!
Thank you, I appreciate that! I'm actually pretty lucky, I've only been in a cast for a few weeks and I'm already able to walk around with crutches.
That's good to hear! I'm sure you'll be back to 100% in no time.
Thanks, I hope so!
So, what are you looking forward to this weekend?
My cosplay costume is coming in the mail so I'm going to start practicing my makeup. I'm really excited to dress up as my favorite character!
That sounds like fun! I'm not really into cosplay but I can appreciate the work that goes into it.
Thanks! It's definitely a lot of work but it's so much fun to see the finished product.
I bet it is!
So, what do you like to do for fun?
I love to play the guitar and sing. I also love to draw. I'm not very good at it but it's a relaxing way to spend some time.
That sounds really cool! I wish I could play the guitar. I'm not very artistic but I love to watch people create things.
It's never too late to learn! I started playing the guitar when I was in high school and I'm still learning new things all the time.
I know, I should really give it a try!
I think you would really enjoy it!
Maybe I will!
I hope you do!
Thanks, I appreciate that!
